dialog.text: Listen up. Stanley has the flu, and Lao was grounded for stealing my brother.
This means that we and another group are the only ones left in this fight.
We need to act now, while we have the upper hand.
You need to get into Oliver's snow fort, ruin his clan's stash of snowballs and take him out.
Oliver always wears black, so you should be able to spot him. After that, nothing should stand in our way!
